mapper.insert: insert into coordi (cd_num, s_num, cd_img, cd_name, regdate, cd_content) values ((select nvl(max(cd_num)+1, 1) from coordi), (select s_num from adshoppingmall where ad_id = #{s_name}), #{cd_img},#{cd_name}, sysdate, #{cd_content})

insert into coordi_detail (cdprd_num,cd_num,cdprd_url1,cdprd_url2,cdprd_url3) values( (select nvl(max(cdprd_num)+1,1) from coordi_detail), (select max(cd_num) from coordi), #{prd_url1},#{prd_url2},#{prd_url3})
